title: Bug 4121 - JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: When the exported jar file is overwritten for the second time, an out of sync message is displayed.
EB: The system should not display an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
SR:
1. Open the directory (project) for export.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
4. Overwrite the exported jar file with a new version.
5. Repeat step 4 for the second time and observe the message displayed.
